name: UICollectionViewDataSourcePrefetching
desc: A protocol that provides advance warning of the data requirements for a collection view, allowing the triggering of asynchronous data load operations.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, prefetchItemsAt: [IndexPath])
items.desc: Tells your prefetch data source object to begin preparing data for the cells at the supplied index paths.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, cancelPrefetchingForItemsAt: [IndexPath])
items.desc: Cancels a previously triggered data prefetch request.
